body.name: MedCline Therapeutic Full Length Body Pillow, Shredded Memory Foam, Removable Cover
features: ENJOY A BLISSFUL NIGHT'S SLEEP: Adjustable stuffing in the MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillow allows for proper alignment of your neck, hips, and body for neutral joint positioning to create a comfortable, supported side-sleeping position. MedCline Body Pillow is useful for medical conditions that benefit from side sleeping, such as snoring, sciatica, fibromyalgia, lower back pain, and pregnancy aches and pains.

MAINTAIN SIDE SLEEPING POSITION ALL NIGHT: No more rolling to your back throughout the night. Unlike firm back wedges or using tennis balls to keep you in position, this patented, fluffy J-shape body pillow comfortably keeps you on your right or left side. Body pillow measures 22” W x 50” L x 6” H.

PATENTED SEAMLESS DESIGN MOLDS TO YOUR BODY: Proprietary blend of adjustable shredded memory foam is designed to contour perfectly to any body shape or size and keep you comfortable all night, every night. Patented seamless inner curvature won't dig into your neck like other contoured body pillows.
PLUSH REMOVABLE AND WASHABLE COVER: All MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillows come with a breathable cover that is machine washable for the ultimate in convenience and durability.

READY FOR INSTANT RELIEF: Body Pillows are compressed for shipping. Once decompressed, fluff the body pillow to help regain shape. MedCline is safe to sleep on immediately but can take 72+ hours for any residual “new memory foam” odors to dissipate.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Discover Blissful Sleep with the MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillow. The MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillow is the most comfortable body pillow available on the market today. The shredded memory foam filling can be customized to your body, including creating a nest for your neck or adding the ideal support for your knees. Designed for side-sleeping comfort, this full-length, J-shaped body pillow provides optimal positioning for your neck, body and hips for a blissful night's sleep.

Discover Blissful Sleep with the MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillow. The MedCline Therapeutic Body Pillow is the most comfortable body pillow available on the market today. The shredded memory foam filling can be customized to your body, including creating a nest for your neck or adding the ideal support for your knees. Designed for side-sleeping comfort, this full-length, J-shaped body pillow provides optimal positioning for your neck, body and hips for a blissful night's sleep.

Customizable Support Shredded memory foam filling can be customized to your body, including creating a nest for your neck or adding the ideal support for your knees. Effortless Side Sleeping Properly align your neck, hips and body for neutral joint positioning in the ideal side-sleeping position for a blissful night's sleep. Patented, Seamless Design Designed for left- or- right side sleeping with patented seamless curvature that won't dig into your neck, like other contoured body pillows.

Reflux Relief System Shoulder Relief System Therapeutic Body Pillow Acid Reflux Relief ✓ Acid reflux + Shoulder Pain Relief ✓ Shoulder Pain Relief Only ✓ General Discomfort ✓ Neck/Back Pain Relief ✓ Decreasing Snoring ✓ Pregnancy Aches and Pains ✓ Gestational Acid Reflux ✓ Degree of Incline 15-20° 10° 0° Sizing 3 sizes 2 sizes 2 sizes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Im 50 years old, 250 lbs and 5"10 female. I'm a side sleeper, I've always had numbness on my arms, shoulders, even legs, lower back pain and not to mention cramps! Every night I can feel the cramps coming so I stretch again until it goes away. The worse thing every morning for me was my lower back pain! UNTILL I purchased this side pillow using my FSA !! OHH EMM GEE! How does this pillow know all my curves and molds it to body from front to back! I know its just half a u shape but the short end of the pillow meets to almost the lower part of my back and the comfort this pillow provides my body is firm enough to give it support and soft enough to mold my shoulders , neck and head on the pillow! I woke up with no back pain, no cramps, no soreness on my body for the first time !!! I swear this is crazy to confess but this started the first day I used this candy cane looking body pillow!My "WTF" Moment- My dog passed away not long ago, he was my roll dog and he went just about everywhere I went. The first day I was using this pillow, I was getting into my comfort spot in the pillow (adjusting pillow location to my body and then my blanket) before watching TV from my bed. As soon as I found my comfort position, and started watching TV, I immediately felt a huge weight lifting away from me and felt so secure and comforted like I was being hugged ! Mind you, I hate tight spaces, crowds, and just feeling I can't breathe... BUT this moment didn't feel like that, I was cozy snugged in between a fat candy cane pillow that made me feel so safe and very relieved and happy!! I've never felt this way since my dog passed and realized this was anxiety , it all happened so fast I just about broke down and cried ..the feeling of a heavy weight lifting from me at that point was my "wtf" moment. All because of a stupid pillow .. seriously!?? Crazy ! Anyway, I've never slept soooo comfortably in a LONG TIME !!!! I was overwhelmed. I smiled all day just how great I feel from a great night sleep ! It's amazing ! I think some people complain it's firm because it is but i think my weight and height has something to do with the awesome comfort!!! I just got this a couple days ago, so I can do an update a month from now to see if the pillow still holds up firmly but as for now, I'm blown away and a true believer now that pillows are life changing !Just an FYI- I have the therepudic pillows, neck pillow, long foam body pillow.. I've tried all these different expensive pillows and NONE has ever made me feel like this not has any taken away my aches. BIG DIFFERENCE !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If I could give 100 stars I would!!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe I have been sleeping all my 44 years without this!! I always thought these were just for pregnant women, but I had some extra FSA I needed to use before the end of the year, and this pillow popped up on the FSA eligible items. Boy am I glad that it did, because let me tell you...I get the best sleep I have EVER had in my life with this thing!! It's like crawling onto your own little cloud to sleep. You feel comfy, snug as a bug in a rug. I wake up more rested because I don't toss and turn anymore. My body feels better too because of it. I don't think I could live without this pillow now. I also recommend getting the pillow case for it to protect the pillow a bit. It's pretty easy to get on. Hands down one of my favorite purchases of 2023!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We have 3 now
reviews.reviewText: My husband got me one of these a few years ago to use up the fsa and I love it so much I talked him into getting one. He spotted one that was a bit cheaper but I persuaded him to stick with this one. I spent a lot of time in bed for nearly a year and this pillow isn’t worn out at all. I was nervous about washing the cover because I thought it would be really difficult to get it back on the pillow. It takes a few minutes. You have to set about the task with an attitude that this is going to take more than a few seconds but it’s really not that difficult or time consuming. We had extra fsa so we got another for me just because of pure laziness. So I don’t have to maneuver the pillow when I want to turn over but I’ve ended up not using it. I’ll save it for when this one does eventually wear out. It’s on year 3 and still very comfortable. The only thing I don’t like is that they have covers you can get in a few different colors but they are super expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short for 6ft man
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my boyfriend who uses 4 pillows to sleep. Due to the hook in the design, it doesn't go down to his feet and since the pillow is so puffy - it adds great support to his knees, but then makes his feet hang, which was a weird sensation. It is hefty in weight. To return it would cost $22.Did buy the L/XL for him and he is 6ft tall. And lays with his legs bent.Pillow is very fluffy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pillow.
reviews.reviewText: Before purchasing this pillow I was waking up so many more times through out the night due to discomfort. I can finally say I was able to sleep more than 2 hours without having to keep adjusting myself. The pillow is full and super soft. I'll probably keep using it even after pregnancy!
